item.title: Travis Kalanick: Uber's plan to get more people into fewer cars
item.description:
Travis Kalanick: Uber's plan to get more people into fewer cars

Uber didn't start out with grand ambitions to cut congestion and pollution. But as the company took off, co-founder Travis Kalanick wondered if there was a way to get people using Uber along the same routes to share rides, reducing costs and carbon footprint along the way.

item.title: Meet the dazzling flying machines of the future | Raffaello D'Andrea
item.description:
Meet the dazzling flying machines of the future | Raffaello D'Andrea

When you hear the word "drone," you probably think of something either very useful or very scary. But could they have aesthetic value? Autonomous systems expert Raffaello D'Andrea develops flying machines, and his latest projects are pushing the boundaries of autonomous flight - from a flying wing that can hover and recover from disturbance to an eight-propeller craft that's ambivalent to orientation ...

item.title: About Moonshot
item.description:
About Moonshot

Moonshot is a new podcast exploring the crazy ideas that may one day become billion dollar companies. Join us as we embark on this crazy journey to chase our own dream with this podcast.

item.title: Jarvis: Your Personal Butler | Home Services | Cleaning Services | Home Cleaning
item.description:
Jarvis: Your Personal Butler | Home Services | Cleaning Services | Home Cleaning

Your Jarvis is your very own, personal butler who will handle all your chores around the home. You will be assigned the same Jarvis each week - this means that the more you use the service, the better it will get as your Jarvis learns to understand and anticipate your needs.
